SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
game.model.Model
public class Model extends Observable
The Model class represents the core game model and follows the Singleton pattern. It handles game states, level progression, user management, and notifications to observers. This class is used to manage the game's state, update levels, switch between levels, and store user data. It extends Observable, allowing it to notify the observers of state changes.

    • loadLevels

      public void loadLevels()
      Loads the levels from the LevelReader and initializes the player. Resets the player's position and lives.

    • nextLevel

      public void nextLevel()
      Proceeds to the next level by transitioning to it and updating the player's position. Notifies observers of the transition.

    • nextLevelTransition

      public void nextLevelTransition()
      Handles the transition to the next level by pausing updates and notifying observers.

    • updateModel

      public void updateModel()
      Updates the model, advancing the current level and checking for game win/loss conditions. Notifies observers of the state changes.
